text: Dera Ismail Khan District is a district in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. The city of Dera Ismail Khan is the capital. It is the most southern district of KPK and has an area of and a population of 1,627,132 as of the 2017 Census. The main language of the district is a dialect of Saraiki. ==Tehsils== * Dera Ismail Khan Tehsil * Kulachi Tehsil * Paharpur Tehsil Category:Districts of British India
title: Dera Ismail Khan District
